p: Several constituents isolated from ZRR have been demonstrated to ameliorate a number of inflammatory responses. 6-Shogaol appeared to alleviate the lung inflammation of mice induced by house dust mite antigen in vivo [ 83]. 6-Gingerol prevented chronic ulcerative colitis through downregulating NF-kB (p65) and suppressing proinflammatory cytokines [ 84]. In addition to chronic colitis, 6-gingerol ameliorated acute colitis by activating adenosine adenosine monophosphate-activated protein kinase [ 85].
